metadata.title: Interim Lands Information System (ILIS)

creators.name: USDA Forest Service, Alaska Department of Natural Resources, Division of Support Services-Land Records Information Section

metadata.description: Data Type: Boundaries  ;Federal Land Records for the State of Alaska in alpha format. Contains land records pertinent to federal lands under the jurisdiction of BLM. Updated land ownership/information is not recorded once the land leaves federal ownership. Subsystems of ILIS are: Land Windows - This data base gives the ability to group a specified set of lands together for report information, studies, etc. Survey Subsystem  - Gives information on federal surveys. Aerial Photography Subsystem - Provides a cross reference for land descriptions and aerial photographs.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Unknown

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: Requestor must complete GIS Starter Kit Data Agreement stating Terms and Conditions for use of Starter Kit Data.

Use constraints: DNR does not recommend use of this data at a larger scale. Greater detail for each layer is provided from DNR, Land Records Information Section, for each data module upon receipt of order.
